plot: The beauty of the land cannot mask the brutality of a farm town. As harvest draws near, Betty goes to desperate lengths to save her family and must coldly decide whom to sacrifice.
title: Runoff
plot_es: The beauty of the land cannot mask the brutality of a farm town. As harvest draws near, Betty goes to desperate lengths to save her family and must coldly decide whom to sacrifice.
plot_en: The beauty of the land cannot mask the brutality of a farm town. As harvest draws near, Betty goes to desperate lengths to save her family and must coldly decide whom to sacrifice.
